verses.verse: וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> And they continued שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> years אֵ֚ין <S%H369><s%> without מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> without war בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> between Syria וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> and Israel פ

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑ית <S%H7992><s%> And it came to pass in the third וַיֵּ֛רֶד <S%H3381><s%> came down יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> that Jehoshaphat מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> unto his servants הַיְדַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> Know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לָ֖נוּ רָמֹ֣ת <S%H7433><s%> ye that Ramoth גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> in Gilead וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we מַחְשִׁ֔ים <S%H2814><s%> [is] ours and we [be] still מִקַּ֣חַת <S%H3947><s%> [and] take אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> it not out of the hand מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֲרָֽם׃ <S%H758><s%> Aram

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <S%H3092><s%> unto Jehoshaphat הֲתֵלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go אִתִּ֛י <S%H854><s%> for לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> with me to battle רָמֹ֣ת <S%H7433><s%> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהֽוֹשָׁפָט֙ <S%H3092><s%> to Jehoshaphat אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כָּמ֧וֹנִי <S%H3644><s%> I [am] as thou כָמ֛וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> you כְּעַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> [art] my people כְעַמֶּ֖ךָ <S%H5971><s%> as thy people כְּסוּסַ֥י <S%H5483><s%> my horses כְּסוּסֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5483><s%> as thy horses

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <S%H3092><s%> And Jehoshaphat אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel דְּרָשׁ־ <S%H1875><s%> Enquire נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please כַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to day אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> I pray thee at the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיִּקְבֹּ֨ץ <S%H6908><s%> together מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּבִיאִים֮ <S%H5030><s%> the prophets כְּאַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> about four מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִישׁ֒ <S%H376><s%> men וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to הַאֵלֵ֞ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against רָמֹ֥ת <S%H7433><s%> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֛ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or אֶחְדָּ֑ל <S%H2308><s%> or shall I forbear וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> ? And they said עֲלֵ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> Go up וְיִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> shall deliver אֲדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> for the Lord בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> [it] into the hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <S%H3092><s%> And Jehoshaphat הַאֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> is there פֹּ֥ה <S%H6311><s%> here נָבִ֛יא <S%H5030><s%> [Is there] not here a prophet לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> besides וְנִדְרְשָׁ֖ה <S%H1875><s%> that we might enquire מֵאוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ׀ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשָׁפָ֡ט <S%H3092><s%> unto Jehoshaphat ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is yet אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֡ד <S%H259><s%> [There is] yet one לִדְרֹשׁ֩ <S%H1875><s%> by whom we may enquire אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מֵאֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I שְׂנֵאתִ֗יו <S%H8130><s%> but I hate כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִתְנַבֵּ֨א <S%H5012><s%> him for he doth not prophesy עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> concerning טוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> good כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> concerning me but evil מִיכָ֖יְהוּ <S%H4321><s%> Micaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִמְלָ֑ה <S%H3229><s%> of Imlah וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <S%H3092><s%> And Jehoshaphat אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יֹאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> say הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Let not the king כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so

וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> called מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about סָרִ֖יס <S%H5631><s%> officer אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> an וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מַהֲרָ֖ה <S%H4116><s%> Hasten מִיכָ֥יְהוּ <S%H4321><s%> [hither] Micaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִמְלָֽה׃ <S%H3229><s%> of Imlah

וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וִֽיהוֹשָׁפָ֣ט <S%H3092><s%> and Jehoshaphat מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְהוּדָ֡ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah יֹשְׁבִים֩ <S%H3427><s%> sat אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> each עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְא֜וֹ <S%H3678><s%> on his throne מְלֻבָּשִׁ֤ים <S%H3847><s%> having put on בְּגָדִים֙ <S%H899><s%> their robes בְּגֹ֔רֶן <S%H1637><s%> in a void place פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> in the entrance שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria וְכָ֨ל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> and all the prophets מִֽתְנַבְּאִ֖ים <S%H5012><s%> prophesied לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made ל֛וֹ צִדְקִיָּ֥ה <S%H6667><s%> And Zedekiah בֶֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son כְּנַעֲנָ֖ה <S%H3668><s%> of Chenaanah קַרְנֵ֣י <S%H7161><s%> him horns בַרְזֶ֑ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and he said כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these תְּנַגַּ֥ח <S%H5055><s%> With these shalt thou push אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> the Syrians עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until כַּלֹּתָֽם׃ <S%H3615><s%> until thou have consumed

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַנְּבִאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> And all the prophets נִבְּאִ֥ים <S%H5012><s%> prophesied כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> thus לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> so saying עֲלֵ֞ה <S%H5927><s%> Go up רָמֹ֤ת <S%H7433><s%> to Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וְהַצְלַ֔ח <S%H6743><s%> and prosper וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> shall deliver יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> [it] into the king's

וְהַמַּלְאָ֞ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the messenger אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הָלַ֣ךְ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> that was gone לִקְרֹ֣א <S%H7121><s%> to call מִיכָ֗יְהוּ <S%H4321><s%> Micaiah דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> now דִּבְרֵ֧י <S%H1697><s%> Behold now the words הַנְּבִיאִ֛ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets פֶּֽה־ <S%H6310><s%> mouth אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> with one ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [declare] good אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king יְהִֽי־ <S%H1961><s%> become נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please [דִבְרֵיךָ כ] (דְבָרְךָ֗ <S%H1697><s%> your word ק) כִּדְבַ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> let thy word אַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> of one מֵהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> of them וְדִבַּ֥רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> of them and speak טּֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> [that which is] good

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מִיכָ֑יְהוּ <S%H4321><s%> And Micaiah חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יֹאמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> what the LORD אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> unto me that will I speak

וַיָּבוֹא֮ <S%H935><s%> So he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <S%H4428><s%> to the king וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him מִיכָ֙יְהוּ֙ <S%H4321><s%> unto him Micaiah הֲנֵלֵ֞ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רָמֹ֥ת <S%H7433><s%> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֛ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or נֶחְדָּ֑ל <S%H2308><s%> or shall we forbear וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> ? And he answered אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> him Go וְהַצְלַ֔ח <S%H6743><s%> and prosper וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> shall deliver יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> [it] into the hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> then הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against כַּמֶּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> how long פְעָמִ֖ים <S%H6471><s%> unto him How many times אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I מַשְׁבִּעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7650><s%> shall I adjure אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> to me לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nothing תְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> thee that thou tell אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> about רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> but אֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> me nothing but [that which is] true בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said רָאִ֤יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> all Israel נְפֹצִ֣ים <S%H6327><s%> scattered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הֶהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> upon the hills כַּצֹּ֕אן <S%H6629><s%> as sheep אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> have לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like רֹעֶ֑ה <S%H7462><s%> that have not a shepherd וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have no אֲדֹנִ֣ים <S%H113><s%> These have no master לָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> let them return אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> every man לְבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> to his house בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> in peace

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <S%H3092><s%> unto Jehoshaphat הֲלוֹא֙ <S%H3808><s%> not אָמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Did I not tell אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about לֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִתְנַבֵּ֥א <S%H5012><s%> thee that he would prophesy עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> concerning ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> no good כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> adversity

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לָכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> thou therefore the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD רָאִ֤יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> sitting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְא֔וֹ <S%H3678><s%> on his throne וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all צְבָ֤א <S%H6635><s%> and all the host הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven עֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> standing עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> on מִימִינ֖וֹ <S%H3225><s%> by him on his right hand וּמִשְּׂמֹאלֽוֹ׃ <S%H8040><s%> and on his left

וַיִּגַּשׁ֙ <S%H5066><s%> went near צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H6667><s%> But Zedekiah בֶֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son כְּנַעֲנָ֔ה <S%H3668><s%> of Chenaanah וַיַּכֶּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִיכָ֖יְהוּ <S%H4321><s%> Micaiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַלֶּ֑חִי <S%H3895><s%> on the cheek וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵי־ <S%H335><s%> Which way זֶ֨ה <S%H2088><s%> he עָבַ֧ר <S%H5674><s%> went רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> the Spirit יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מֵאִתִּ֖י <S%H853><s%> לְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> from me to speak אוֹתָֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַתַּעֲלֶ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> increased הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> And the battle בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king הָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become מָעֳמָ֛ד <S%H5975><s%> was stayed up בַּמֶּרְכָּבָ֖ה <S%H4818><s%> in his chariot נֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> against אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> the Syrians וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> and died בָּעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> at even וַיִּ֥צֶק <S%H3332><s%> ran out דַּֽם־ <S%H1818><s%> and the blood הַמַּכָּ֖ה <S%H4347><s%> of the wound אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into חֵ֥יק <S%H2436><s%> into the midst הָרָֽכֶב׃ <S%H7393><s%> of the chariot

וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> And there went הָרִנָּה֙ <S%H7440><s%> a proclamation בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> throughout the host כְּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> about the going down הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Every man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עִיר֖וֹ <S%H5892><s%> to his city וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> to his own country
